lead_paragraph: John R. Houser, who had a history of mental illness, denigrated women, blacks and gay people in the journal he kept before killing two people and himself in July.
snippet: John R. Houser, who had a history of mental illness, denigrated women, blacks and gay people in the journal he kept before killing two people and himself in July.

headline.main: Chilling Messages in Journal of Louisiana Theater Shooter
headline.print_headline: Chilling Messages in Journal of Louisiana Theater Shooter

abstract: Journal left behind by John R Houser, who carried out mass shooting at Lafayette, La, movie theater in July 2015, contains chilling references to violence, South Carolina mass shooter Dylann Roof and invective against women, blacks, gays and news media.
